prodNameC: 羅氏人類上皮因子接受體第2蛋白四合一品管玻片
prodNameE: Roche PATHWAY HER-2 4 in 1 Control Slides
ingredientsDesc: PATHWAY HER-2 4 in 1 Control Slides contain formalin fixed, paraffin embedded cell pellets that have been derived from human breast cancer cell lines. The pellets have been cut into 4μm sections and placed on charged slides. When stained with PATHWAY HER-2 (CB11) primary antibody or PATHWAY HER2 (4B5) primary antibody, the cell lines produced HER-2/neu staining scores of 0, 1+, 2+, and 3+. Ten slides, each containing the 4different cell lines in a single paraffin section, are provided.
applicantName: 台灣羅氏醫療診斷設備股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市中山區民權東路3段2號10樓
efficacy: Ventana Medical Systems (Ventana)的PATHWAY HER-2四合一對照玻片是用作已分析的半定量品管材料，藉以與Ventana PATHWAY HER-2 (CB11)一級抗體及PATHWAY HER2 (4B5)一級抗體一起使用時在Ventana自動切片染色機上監控抗c-erb-2/HER-2的免疫組織化學染色過程之表現性。
